titleStmt.title: The siege of Breda written in Latin by the R.F. Herman Hvgo of the S. of I. Translated into English by C.H.G.
Obsidio Bredana armis Philippi IIII. English
titleStmt.author: Hugo, Herman, 1588-1629.
Gage, Henry, Sir, ca. 1597-1645.

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Obsidio Bredana armis Philippi IIII.
Printer's name from colophon. Variant: colophon lacking.
Running title reads: The seige of Breda.
The plates are copied from the Latin edition printed at Antwerp, 1626.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery, San Marino, California.
